name: Gerrymandering: Red vs Blue
description:
The game is a turn based strategy/board game where players(or AI) take turn re-drawing districts of a city to benefit their political party.

It features game modes with flexible and customizable gameplay parameters such as city size, number of districts, balance, population size and density.

What is Gerrymandering?

To understand what the game is about, we must understand the problem of gerrymandering which is explained well in video below.

Quick look at gameplay.

Please note android version is early access, don't hesitate to report any problems if you find any.


Every purchase helps spread the message and educate more people about gerrymandering.
